div.h1: Dispute Finder : Reveal the other side of the story

ol.li: Dispute Finder highlights disputed claims on pages you read on the web
Click on a claim to see web articles that support other points of view
Tell Dispute Finder about a claim on the web that you disagree with
Give Dispute Finder arguments for other points of view
Skeptical Readers will now be told that this claim is disputed when they read a page that contains text that resembles a paraphrase of a disputed claim.
